calculations.name: Current Quarter Quota
calculations.formula: if datepart("quarter",[Close Date])=datepart("quarter", [Today]) and datepart("year",[Close Date])=datepart("year", [Today]) And (([Parameters].[Opportunity Type]=[Opportunity Type] or [Parameters].[Opportunity Type]="All" )and ([Parameters].[Product Name]=[Product Name] or [Parameters].[Product Name]="All" ))then [Quota] else 0 end

calculations.name: Today
calculations.formula:
Date("5/30/2015")
// We fixed today on 5/31/2015 in this sample since this is a static data set. In real time data, you can use today() instead.

calculations.name: Opportunity Type Filter
calculations.formula: if [Parameters].[Opportunity Type]="All" then 0 elseif [Parameters].[Opportunity Type]= [Opportunity Type]then 1 end
